CatDescriptText: Cutline of image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, July 21, 1945, pg. 9, reads: "Mrs. Robertson Honored - Mrs. S. P. Robertson of New Orleans, La., the houseguest of Mrs. Burl Moone for the past week, was guest of honor at a charming reception last week, given at the home of Mrs. Alma Illery by Mrs. Earl V. Hord,   Mrs. Illery and Mrs. Thomas Stokes.  Shown in the receiving line are Mmes. Albert Lucas, S. F. Williman, W. J. Curtis, Mrs. Robertson, the guest of honor; Cora Sweede, Burl Moone, Thomas E. Stokes, Earl V. Hord and Major Illery... - Harris Photos.
TitMainTitle: Mrs. Albert Lucas, Minnie Williman, Mrs. W. J. Curtis, Mrs. S. P. Robertson, Cora Sweede, Mrs. Burl Moone, Mrs. Thomas E. Stokes, Rema Hord, and Alma Illery, gathered in Illery home for reception honoring Robertson
